resources.string: Privacy note example: The app will have access to your location even when you are not using the app. The data is not further processed or stored in any way. More details are available in Privacy policy. See User Data handling requirements for more information.

As of Android 11, you can\'t get permissions to both background and foreground locations in a single request. Please enable foreground position first by clicking the following button and then add the widget.

Consent example: The widget requires background location permissions to function.\n\nThe app will have access to your location even when you are not using the app. The data is not further processed or stored in any way.
The widget requires background location permissions to function.
